Art Portfolio

I'm more of a developer, but art has always been a big part of my life.

Latest Body of Work

The drawings below were all made around 2016. They are inspired by my bike rides around St. Louis and the photos I took while exploring the city. I was hoping to capture the variety of architecture, a sense of movement, the wonder of discovering new places, the recollections of the deep history of the city

  • Academy Charcoal on paper

  • Dutchtown Charcoal on paper

  • Enright Charcoal on paper

  • Fairgrounds Charcoal on paper

  • Howard Charcoal on paper

  • Hyde House Charcoal on paper

  • O'Fallon Charcoal on paper

  • Monroe Treehouse Graphite on paper

  • Russell Charcoal on paper

  • Thornby Charcoal on paper

  • Virginia Charcoal on paper

  • Washington Charcoal on paper

  • West End Charcoal on paper

  • West Florissant Charcoal on paper
